assessment_type.description: Type of assessment based on available measurements

assessment_justification.description: Brief explanation of why this assessment type was determined

specific_documentation.description: Exact criterion met with measured values (e.g., 'Moderate malnutrition per ASPEN anthropometric criterion z-score -2 to -2.9 (BMI-for-age z-score -2.3 measured on 3/15/25)')

severity.description: Severity level for this specific criterion

criteria_satisfied.description: List of all criteria satisfied with specific documentation

criteria_not_met.description: List of standard criteria that were assessed but not satisfied

missing_data.description: List of recommended assessments needed with clinical rationale

severity.description: Overall malnutrition severity (highest severity among satisfied criteria)

aspen_indicator_count.description: Number of ASPEN indicators met out of 4 possible (e.g., '3/4 indicators met - exceeds threshold of 2+ for diagnosis')

confidence.description: Confidence level in classification based on data completeness and assessment type

clinical_reasoning.description: Comprehensive clinical summary integrating all findings with temporal context and specific criterion references
